channel.title: Talking about life, one stitch at a time.
channel.description: Talking about life, one stitch at a time.

item.title: With every season, there comes a new color…
item.description:
With every season, there comes a new color…

I’m fascinated, yet confounded by how often I see news about color. This seasons colors….. Pantone’s colors… home decor… fashion….

item.title: No title
item.description: While working on this new website of course, the main thing on my mind was content. It didn't matter how good the site looked if I had nothing to talk about.
